content:
In 2020, during the first lockdown, I decide to create a webradio, to talk about unknown creators, though with a lot of talent.
Today (2022), I work less on it, having less time with classes (it’s hard to have free time in high school), so I release a show every 2 to 4 months.
The podcasts I created
La Radio Pomme Raconte La Radio Pomme Raconte is my first podcast, where I talk about creations that are unknown to the general public, but that deserve to be recognized
